field.label: Enable Propagation Node
field.help: Enable the LXMF propagation node daemon (lxmd). This provides store-and-forward messaging for the Reticulum network. Requires the Reticulum daemon to be enabled and running.

field.label: Enable Node Functionality
field.help: Enable propagation node functionality within lxmd.

field.label: Announce at Start
field.help: Announce the propagation node on the Reticulum network when lxmd starts. This makes the node discoverable by LXMF clients.

field.label: Auto-Peer
field.help: Automatically peer with other propagation nodes discovered on the network. Peered nodes synchronize their message stores.

field.label: Auto-Peer Max Depth
field.help: Maximum hop count for auto-peering with other propagation nodes (1-128).

field.label: Message Storage Limit
field.help: Maximum number of messages to store. Set to 0 for unlimited storage.

field.label: Message Storage Path
field.help: Filesystem path for the LXMF message database.

field.label: Max Message Size (KB)
field.help: Maximum accepted size for a single LXMF message in kilobytes.

field.label: Sync Interval (seconds)
field.help: Interval in seconds between message synchronization with peered propagation nodes.

field.label: Prioritise Local Delivery
field.help: Prioritise direct local message delivery over propagation to other nodes.
